Precious Metals Go Digital

CyberMetals allows individual investment into securely stored gold and silver at the lowest possible cost. Your free account allows you to trade precious metals 24/7, and through our partnership with JM Bullion, redeem physical precious metals at any time.

Build your portfolio
Buy and sell digital precious metals, securely stored and insured.

Build your portfolio with automated purchases of any of our products.
Physical Redemption
Convert your CyberMetals holdings into any products sold by our partner, JM Bullion.
Mobile Apps
Track your portfolio performance and trade 24/7 using the CyberMetals iOS and Android apps.

Why Choose Us
CyberMetals is the premier digital precious metals trading platform - below are some of the reasons why.
Peace of Mind
Your directly-owned precious metals are held in secure custody, fully insured by Lloyd's of London.
Tightest Spreads
We offer the tightest spreads in the marketplace, allowing you to acquire the most precious metals for your money.
Easy Redemption
Through our partnership with JM Bullion, you can convert your CyberMetals position into physical precious metals at any time.
